title: Silver Presidente Bernardes Medal
content: I was awarded the Silver Presidente Bernardes Medal for achieving the highest GPA in the Computer Science course at the Federal University of Viçosa (UFV).

title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
content: I graduated in Computer Science from the Federal University of Viçosa (UFV).

title: Selected for the Undergraduate Research Scholarship PIBIC/CNPq at Federal University of Viçosa
content: I was selected for the Undergraduate Research Scholarship PIBIC/CNPq at Federal University of Viçosa, with the research theme 'Tools for efficient resolution and integrated visualization of multi-component routing problems'.
